alert.note: Alert for Hamilton; Northern Columbia; Suwannee (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 23 at 5:51PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Columbia, northern Suwannee, Hamilton, Echols and southwestern Clinch Counties through 615 PM EDT... At 550 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles northeast of Jasper, moving southwest at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Jasper, Jennings, Suwannee Springs, Statenville, Suwannee River State Park, Mayday, Needmore, Belmont and Crossroads. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
